ComicInfo.Title: Raniy Day Cooze
ComicInfo.Summary:
A new full-color comic book from that saucy and nasty Rebecca. For anyone unfamiliar with Eros' hit series Housewives at Play, this is a great jumping-on point. Longtime fans will be thrilled and delighted too, as storyteller Rebecca continues the erotic adventures of Cathy, her sister Lynn, and Cathy's daughter Melissa. Back home once more, Melissa is enrolled in Catholic high school while Mom and Auntie pretend to look for work. A lip smackin' juicy time is guaranteed for all. 24-page full-color comic book.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:03:18. [CVDB172569]
